artist: Artist: After Hubert François Bourguignon Gravelot; Engraver: Charles le Vasseur
description: King Henry IV on horseback, PR arm raised to prevent killing of fallen man; surrounded by group of men, some dead and others begging for clemency; soldiers behind
inscription:
Signature, and Inscription

on sheet below image in black: [H.Gravelot, inv  C. le Vasseur sculpt./ Sa valeur les vainquit, fa vertu les enchaîne].  in pencil on sheet : [1-495/Henry 4 of France]
title: The Clemency of Henry IV
